# sharedSpellCheckerExists

**Type Property**

Returns whether the application’s NSSpellChecker has already been created.

## Declaration

```swift
class var sharedSpellCheckerExists: Bool { get }
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the shared spell checker already exists, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Getting the Spell Checker

- **shared**: Returns the NSSpellChecker (one per application).
